scripts.postinstall: node -e "if(process.platform!=='win32'){require('child_process').execSync('apt-get update && apt-get install -y wget ca-certificates fonts-liberation libappindicator3-1 libasound2 libatk-bridge2.0-0 libatk1.0-0 libcups2 libdbus-1-3 libgdk-pixbuf2.0-0 libnspr4 libnss3 libx11-xcb1 libxcomposite1 libxdamage1 libxrandr2 xdg-utils',{stdio:'inherit'})}"
